title: help me create a user flow
description: Assistance in creating a user flow with UI blocks and resources
summary: The chat involved a user requesting help to create a user flow. The assistant responded by suggesting breaking down the request into UI blocks, such as defining user goals, mapping out user actions, designing the interface, and testing the user flow. Additionally, a resource card was provided, recommending the use of a User Flow Tool to visually map out user journeys, with a suggestion to consider including different user personas.
